name: FunctionalStatusRelatedQuestionnairePanelCodes
title: Functional Status Related Questionnaire Panel Codes
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contain LOINC Panel codes pertaining to functional status questionnaire panels.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to find questionnaires patients have completed or to find patients that have completed questionnaires. The codes may also be used to generate questionnaire forms and conformant FHIR Questionnaire and QuestionnaireResponse Resources using the NIH LHC Forms Widget.),(Inclusion Criteria: High-level functional status questionnaire LOINC panel codes),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes contained inside the panels as they can be derived with tooling.)
